WaterfallChart.name: Waterfall Chart
WaterfallChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: change the y axis type to “numbers”.
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents a “period”, the top of each rect represents “current”, the bottom represents “previous”, the fill color represents “category”.

MarimekkoChart.name: Marimekko Chart
MarimekkoChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each row represents a “class”, each rectangle represents “demographic”. The rectangle width represents “percent class”, the height represents “percentage total”, the fill color represents “demographic”.

GanttChart.name: Gantt Chart
GanttChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: change the x axis type to “dates”.
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents a “Task”, the left of each rectangle represents “Start Date”, the right represents “End date”, the y position represents “Task”, the fill color represents “Task”.

Heatmap.name: Heatmap
Heatmap.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents a “rowID”, the x position of each rectangle represents “Draft_Pick”, the y position represents “Draft_Year”, the fill color represents “VORP”.

TowerChart.name: Tower Chart
TowerChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents a “State” for a “Candidate”, the rectangle width represents “Candidate Margin”, the height represents “Candidate EV”, the fill color represents “State”.

BulletChart.name: Bullet Chart
BulletChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Lasso select y labels.
Object-Data Mappings: Each row represents a “Region”, the width of a blue rectangle represents “Target”, the width of a red rectangle represents “Measure”.

DivergingBarChart.name: Diverging Bar Chart
DivergingBarChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: change the x axis type to “numbers” and the y axis type to “categories”.
Object-Data Mappings: Each row represents an “Age Group”, each rectangle represents a “Response”. The rectangle width represents “Percentage”, the fill color represents “Response”. The left segments of rectangles representing “Strongly disagree” are aligned.

SmallMultipleBarChart.name: Small Multiple Bar Chart
SmallMultipleBarChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: change the x axis type to “none”.
Object-Data Mappings: Each group represents a “State”, each rectangle represents a “year”. The x and y position of each group enodes “MapX” and “MapY”. The rectangle height represents “PVI Score”, the fill color represents “Inclination”.

GroupedStackedBarChart.name: Grouped Stacked Bar Chart
GroupedStackedBarChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Create a second-level x label box and drag&drop “Age 31-49” and “Age 60-64” labels into it.
Object-Data Mappings: Each column represents a “Subcategory” and are grouped by “Category”, each rectangle represents a “Region”. The rectangle height represents “Sales”, and the fill color represents “Region”.

GlyphChart.name: Glyph Chart
GlyphChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each column represents a “Food Type”. The height of the darker rectangle in each group represents the value from “1960”, and the height of the lighter rectangle in each group represents the value from “2008-2012”.

TreemapBarchart.name: Treemap Barchart
TreemapBarchart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Create a second-level x label box and drag&drop “1985”, “1995”, “2005” and “2015” labels into it.
Object-Data Mappings: Each column represents a “Subcategory” and are grouped by “Category”, each color group represents a “Region” and each rectangle represents an “Order ID”. The area of each rectangle represents “Sales”, and the fill color represents “Region”.

CalenderChart.name: Calender Chart
CalenderChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Create a second-level y label box and drag&drop “2011”, “2012”, “2013” and “2014” labels into it.
Object-Data Mappings: Each group represents a “location”, and each rectangle represents a “date”. The x position of a rectangle represents “Week”, the y position represents “DayOfWeek”, and the fill color represents “meanTemp”.

RangeChart.name: Range Chart
RangeChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Lasso select y labels.
Object-Data Mappings: Each thin rectangle represents a “date”. The x position of each rectangle represents “date”, the bottom represents “minTemp”, the top represents “maxTemp”, and the fill color represents “meanTemp”.

StackedBarChart.name: Stacked Bar Chart
StackedBarChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each column represents a “date”, and each rectangle represents an “industry”. The rectangle height represents “unemployments”, and the fill color represents “industry”.

WaffleChart.name: Waffle Chart
WaffleChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: Lasso select the legend area (which will fix the incorrect x axis detection also).
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents an “ID”, and the fill color represents “Age Bin”.

WaffleBarChart.name: Waffle Bar Chart
WaffleBarChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each group represents a “Subcategory”, and each rectangle represents an “Order ID”. The fill color of each rectangle represents “Region”.

barChart.name: Bar Chart
barChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each rectangle represents a “Month”, and the rectangle width represents “Death”.

PyramidChart.name: Pyramid Chart
PyramidChart.about:
Axis&Legend Inspection: all correct.
Object-Data Mappings: Each row represents a “Date”, and each rectangle represents a “Gender”. The rectangtle width represents “Unemployment”, and the fill color represents “Gender”.
